container-title: Systems and Technology Group Senior Vice President and General Counsel stockholder information IBM STOCKHOLDER SERVICES IBM INVESTOR SERVICES PROGRAM Stockholders with questions about their accounts should contact: The Investor Services Program brochure outlines a number of services EquiServe Trust Company, N.A
note: provided for IBM stockholders and potential IBM investors, including P.O. Box 43072 the reinvestment of dividends, direct purchase and the deposit of Providence, Rhode Island 02940-3072 IBM stock certificates for safekeeping. Call (888) 421-8860 for a copy (888) IBM-6700 of the brochure. Investors residing outside the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico should call (781) 575-2727.

title: Investors residing outside the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico should call (781) 575-2727. Investors with other requests may write to: IBM Corporation Stockholders can also reach EquiServe Trust Company, N.A. via e-mail Stockholder Relations at: ibm@equiserve.com New Orchard Road Hearing-impaired stockholders with access to a telecommunications Armonk, New York 10504 device (TDD) can communicate directly with EquiServe Trust Company, N.A., by calling (800) 490-1493. Stockholders residing outside the IBM STOCK United States, Canada and Puerto Rico should call (781) 575-2694. IBM common stock is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and on other exchanges in the United States and around the world
